QuICT.qcda.optimization.cnot_template.cnot_force module¶

Bases: QuICT.qcda.optimization._optimization.Optimization

use bfs to optimize the cnot circuit

QuICT.qcda.optimization.cnot_template.cnot_force.apply_cx(state, control, target, n)¶

apply cnot gate to the state

Parameters

  • state (int) – the state represent the matrix

  • control (int) – the control index for the cx gate

  • target (int) – the target index for the cx gate

  • n (int) – number of qubits in the matrix

Returns

the new state after applying the gate

Return type

int
